name: One in a Million
description:
A sleek bullet hell where you must deal 1,000,000 damage without taking a single hit.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Right Mouse - Dash
  • Middle Mouse - Screen Clear. Consumes half of your dash energy and permanently lowers dash regeneration.
  • Escape - Exit game
  • Enter - Restart game
  • Tilde (~) - Show debug info
  • Number keys 2-7 (title screen) - Enter practice mode for that specific phase

Made in a week as a personal project.
